name: Restart (DelusionalCreature)
description:
Puzzle Game!

Hello, the game is on alpha so there aren't many puzzles. It's the first time I join a GameJam so I'm exited to get some feedback. Of course bugs are expected, I would appreciate if you can let them on the comment section so I can fix them later on.

(English is not my first language). Thanks for reading! There's more information inside the game, at the main menu.
